Question 45) The environmental issue, one of the main contemporary agenda, enabled the emergence of diverse political conceptions, among which the environmental preservation stands out, which suggests an idea of ​​nature's untouchability and prevents its economic use under any justification.
PORTO-GONÇALVES, C. W. The globalization of nature and the nature of considering the current political conceptions on the environmental issue, the dynamics characterized in the text regarding the protection of the environment is based on
A) Sustainable economic practice.
B) containment of environmental impacts.
C) Progressive use of natural resources.
D) Permanent prohibition of nature exploitation.
E) definition of priority areas for economic exploitation.
